column5: I just got this pic from a guy who was out fishing musky and caught this monster smallie on a Electric Black Double 10
i got a 24 inch 7.5lb smallie on a 8 inch minnow while fishing for musky... and i get big largmouth a couple times a year... like 5 lbers
Now thats a good testament to the quality of your baits, eh Mike?
Best big bass lure on Scugog is a muskie bucktail
I caught a monster smallie on a TopRaider on the French a few years ago!
I don't fish for bass at all but every year I land a couple bigguns on musky baits, and the bigger the baits, the bigger the bass.  Darned pesky green fish
It's a teez when you've been casting 8oz baits all day and when you finally get a hit... Bucket mouth...
holly molly that is a football!...
I got a 3 inch pearch on a 7 inch Rapala last week
Last night got 2 perch trolling 30 foot model taildancers... Lol
I got a 2lb. er hooked on the side of the head trolling the a 10" soft muskie bait. Release fine though.
exactly why I throw 10" worms and huge flippin jigs for bass they are lazy fish and want 1 huge meal over a bunch of little ones sometimes and some days they want a fly LOL stupid fish

4 fours will always beat 5 threes. Not as many but often bigger with the big baits.  That is a big fat smallie for this time of year. Was the pic taken a few weeks ago?  Maybe she had not spawned yet??  odd.  Nice fish though.
